name: MyCactusFarm
description:
Our game for the EPFL Orbital Game Jam 2022

The goal is to have a lot of money. You have to harvest your cactus to get some money (more the cactus are big, more you win money). Moreover be carreful of the bad Santiago(s), they make you lose money (kill them quickly !)

Controls:

Harvest -> SPACE

Shop -> CLICK ON THE SHOP ICON

Quit the shop -> SPACE

Plant cactus -> N

Shop:

In the shop, you can buy some features:

- Bob (farmer) is walking faster

- Santiago(s) go faster

- Kill all bad Santiago (cactus)

Authors:

- Pppfff

- Lisaxgamer007

- Nairaulf
